title: Bloomberg Markets: The Engine Supports Hard Science Companies
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: The Engine Supports Hard Science Companies
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Reed Sturtevant General Partner The Engine Discussing venture capital fund in conjunction with MIT that seeks to drive innovation in hard physical sciences. Bloomberg Contributor Woody Benson also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
